title: Gotta love the system...
body:
Got lvl 6 Ivern with S+ and S
my next two scores were S- and S-

Some part of you dies a little when this happens.

Of course this has happened with all my lvl 7 slogs _(I'm one of the guys who has that kinda luck)_ 

Its funny how doing well and getting S grade scores, is actually more off-putting than feeding your ass off...
